name: Super Bout: Champion's Tour
description:
2 fighter enter the ring, one will leave victorious. Knock your opponent out or knock them out of the ring to score points. Score enough points to secure victory in Super Bout: Champion's Tour!

Super Bout: Champion's Tour is a 1v1 fighting game featuring lightning fast game play, deep strategy, a training mode, and an advanced, adaptive AI opponent.

Choose from 1 of 4 characters and fight your way through arcade mode, battle your friends offline, or play online and climb to the top of the online leaderboard!

Super Bout: Champion's Tour features state of the art 8-bit graphics and sound effects like nothing you've seen before. You'll feel like you are really there in the ring, fighting for your pride, only your opponent standing between you and victory. Find your opponent's weakness and strike! But don't get comfortable, every strategy has a weakness. Stay on your toes or your opponent will be the one standing in triumph when the match is over.
